responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "98A08424495661E89C39838C8BE97856", "Well now, another new soul washed up in Bonfire. Good to see it. More hands make the crossing easier - if they\'re willing to haul the line, that is. This reclamation isn\'t just about fending off the horned menace. Its about rebuilding from the keel up. We need food, shelter, supplies. Every journey starts with the simple steps. I see you\'ve got grit, but every traveler needs a way to pitch in, so that all may weather the storm.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_HimaLuraki_4_Response
